Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Establishes the New York state joint eating disorder awareness campaign and the New York state joint eating disorder awareness campaign fund
Summary: Establishes the New York state joint eating disorder awareness campaign and the New York state joint eating disorder awareness campaign fund; provides that the commissioner of mental health may enter into a multi-year contract for the operation and promotion of the New York state joint eating disorder awareness campaign subject to such terms and conditions as may be contained within such contract with a not-for-profit organization that has experience working with New York state organizations that have expertise in eating disorder promotional campaigns.
LawCode: Add §7.49, Ment Hyg L; add §95-j, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to a New York state joint eating disorder awareness campaign; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to the New York state joint eating disorder awareness campaign fund
